title: ECE Prof/Tech Comm
description: Written, oral, and visual communication skills required by electrical and computer engineers.  Prepares students for advanced communication tasks required in academic and professional settings.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (ECE 3025 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3072 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3084 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3056 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3057 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
